data.title: Oil, Fuel, Petrol, Wood Chip & Log Fuel Ayrshire
data.meta_description: Campbell Fuels provide a reliable oil and fuel service throughout West of Scotland. We supply energy for homes, businesses and vehicles.
data.text:
At Campbell Fuels we pride ourselves in delivering a reliable service. We work hard to ensure we can meet all of our customersâ€™ requirements, at the most competitive prices. Since we began in 1967, our core values have always focused around upholding our reputation as an efficient and reliable family-run business.

We accommodate the needs of a wide variety of Industrial, Domestic and Agricultural customers. We are very proud of the long-lasting client relationships we have built over the past 40 years, and enjoy welcoming new customers to Campbell Fuels.
